title: Mercury Transit in the 1st House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 1st house for Scorpio Ascendant, thinking, communication, and self-expression become sharp and noticeable. The mind stays active, observant, and strategic, making this a phase of quick responses and calculated speech. Personal opinions are expressed confidently, sometimes too directly. Curiosity about people and situations increases. When used consciously, this transit strengthens intelligence, persuasive ability, and adaptive decision-making without slipping into overthinking or mental restlessness.
